page.title: 20SARAH'S DAY IN AMPNEY
page.content: My name is Sarah and I am 10 years old. My alarm clock wakes me and I sit up in bed. I get up and get dressed. I get the paper from the barn. I take my dog Snoopy with me. I lay the breakfast. I have Shreddies and sausage sandwiches. Then I get ready for school. Mum drives us. We work at school all day at Maths and writing. We sometimes have a swim. After school at home I change and take Snoopy for a walk up a 3 mile bumpy, stony track. I return and play on my bike or "off ground tag" with my brother. We have tea of quiche, salad and cherry pie.I watch T.V. Then I bike round the village till bath time. When I am in bed I set my alarm to wake me at 7 a.m. the next day.
